Gftt_Response.title: gftt response

image.title: image
image.tooltip: input image with shape (B,C,H,W)

grads_mode.title: grads_mode
grads_mode.tooltip: can be 'sobel' for standalone use or 'diff' for use on Gaussian pyramid.

sigmas.title: sigmas
sigmas.tooltip: coefficients to be multiplied by multichannel response.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: the response map per channel with shape (B,C,H,W)
